original_title: Guns N' Roses: Live At Saskatoon
overview: Guns N' Roses - 1993-03-23 - Saskatoon, CANADA (pro-shot) EVSD. This is from Skin N' Bones Tour, wich was one of the best leg of any Guns N' Roses tour. They did a five songs acoustic set during the show (You Ain't The First, You're Crazy, Used To Love Her, Patience and Knockin' On Heaven's Door).There are technical difficulties with Axl's microphone during the first few minutes of 'You Could Be Mine,' so the band starts the song over after it's straightened out.
title: Guns N' Roses: Live At Saskatoon
